metadata.title: Bref de N.S. Pere la Pape Gregoire XIIII. envoyé a Monseignevr l'Euesque de Plaisance. Contenant la premiere resolution de sa Saincteté sur les affaires du royaume de France & de lal ville de Paris.
metadata.creator: Catholic Church.Pope (1590-1591 : Gregory XIV)
Catholic Church. Pope (1590-1591 : Gregory XIV)
Sega, Felipe, 1537-1596. Breve
Nivelle, Robert, 1558-1598, printer
Thierry, Rolin, d. 1623, printer
metadata.publisher: Paris : R. Nivelle et R. Thierry, 1591
metadata.description: In box labeled: Miscellanées. Bulles pontificales, etc
Letter of Gregorius dated Rome January 20, 1591; text in Latin and French
"Philippvs Episcopvs Placentinvs omnibus totius regni Galliæ Catholicis cuiusque ordinis" (p. 3-7, 13-17) dated Paris, February 22, 1591; text in Latin and French
metadata.notes: No copyright found. No table of contents found. Damaged, stained pages and cover.
